content: a colorful geometric-themed overlay mosaic crochet pattern this blanket pattern was designed by 11 incredible crochet designers each designer created a stunning geometric-themed stripe for this blanket the **free** crochetalong cal runes throughout june 2024 & the patterns will continue to be free on the designer s website forever learn more on the cal page 1 or you can grab the ebook & have everything all in one place 2 you can post pictures and join the community in the facebook group 3 **yarn colorways used ** * hint of silver color a - 1900 yards/6 skeins * lipstick red - 320 yards/1 skein * spice orange - 320 yards/1 skein * dandelion yellow - 320 yards/1 skein * green green - 320 yards/1 skein * aster blue - 320 yards/1 skein * violet purple - 160 yards/1 skein 1 https //www juniperandoakes com/blog/geometric-mosaic-crochetalong-free 2 https //juniperandoakes thrivecart com/mosaic-in-a-month-crochetalong/ ref=ravelry 3 https //www facebook com/groups/juniperandoakes
